title: Mini-Ep 125: Bike Shorts and Clean Sheets
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 125: Bike Shorts and Clean Sheets
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree find comfort in bike shorts and cleansers. Then they get a cozy mystery recc and hear from listeners about thank you notes, when to replace bedding, and the anxieties of teaching during a pandemic. Word of the Day: Nurture....
description:
Kate and Doree find comfort in bike shorts and cleansers. Then they get a cozy mystery recc and hear from listeners about thank you notes, when to replace bedding, and the anxieties of teaching during a pandemic. 


Word of the Day: Nurture. 


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Good Moms Bad Choices Podcast - Episodes drop every Wednesday morning. Listen and subscribe on Apple Podcasts or wherever you listen to podcasts.
